name: angular-skeleton
description: Basic angular skeleton, supporting production distributions, AOT compilation and lazy load
author: Santiago H. Cardona

scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules dist && npm cache clean
scripts.build: rimraf codegen dist && cp -r src/. codegen && echo "Running AOT compilation..." && ngc && webpack && rimraf codegen
scripts.build:prod: rimraf codegen dist && cp -r src/. codegen && echo "Running AOT compilation..." && ngc && webpack && rimraf codegen
